sn6.8:1.4: Then, referring to the bhikkhu Katamorakatissaka, the independent brahmā Suddhāvāsa recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn6.8:2.1: An immeasurable one by taking his measure?
sn6.8:2.2: “What wise man here would seek to define
sn6.8:2.3: He who would measure an immeasurable one
sn6.8:2.4: Must be, I think, an obstructed moron. ”
